Hi Hussain, what type of training are you looking to offer? Leadership? Diversity? Project Management? I would say to examine the competencies needed for your staff and develop training based on the competencies.  Here's one example on Technology Competencies that you may be able to adjust to fit your needs. 
http://www.plcmc.org/public/learning/plcmccorecomp.pdf
